title: Full Stack Developer - Messaging and Automation Dev/Ops
description:
Join our team and what we‚Äôll accomplish together

As telecommunications technology rapidly advances, TELUS is committed to providing reliable and innovative communications solutions through cutting-edge automation and efficient operational frameworks.
The Messaging and Automation DevOps team plays a crucial role in realizing TELUS's Customer First vision through collaboration with cross-functional teams across the organization. Our mission is to enable and support advanced telephony, messaging, and emergency communications products and services that are robust, scalable, and seamlessly operational.
We embrace technological advancement and process evolution, continuously learning and adapting to meet future challenges. Our team culture celebrates both successes and learning opportunities, fostering an environment of continuous improvement and innovation in automation.
We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be innovative, proactive, and passionate about automation and operational excellence.

Key Responsibilities:
¬†

Support the PTS team in implementing robust platform deployment solutions
Design and implement comprehensive automation solutions for operational efficiency
Develop event-driven and data-driven frameworks for zero-touch service mitigation and change management
Build auto-healing capabilities for service improvements

¬†
This role offers an opportunity to shape the future of telecommunications infrastructure through advanced automation and framework design, working with cutting-edge technologies in an agile, collaborative environment.

What you‚Äôll do

As a member of our dynamic team, you will need to demonstrate
¬†

Strong analytical mindset with ability to translate customer feedback into technical solutions
Excellent problem-solving skills with customer-centric approach
Adaptability and agility in a fast-paced technology environment
Strong collaboration skills and ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams
Commitment to service reliability and operational excellence
Proven ability to build and maintain stakeholder relationships
Experience in leading technical initiatives and driving improvements
Capability to balance multiple priorities and deliver results in a dynamic environment


What you bring
¬†

Proficiency in automation scripting (Python, Ansible, Shell)
Familiar with modern web front end frameworks (React, Vue, Angular)
Understanding of data modeling and ETL processes
Understanding of API design principles (REST, GraphQL)
Familiar with Git repo and CI/CD pipeline
Familiar with private cloud (OpenStack, OpenShift) and public cloud (GCP and/or AWS) environments and cloud native concepts
A strong end to end ownership culture mindset towards product and end customer experience
Understand best practices for building easy to use, scalable, resilient and secure services and applications
Initiative, attention to details and problem-solving attitude
Recognized 5 years relevant professional work experience
Bachelor degree in Computer science, Engineering degree or related field

¬†
Great-to-haves
¬†

Proven experience in designing and implementing complex data models
Expertise in database management systems (SQL, NoSQL, Time-series DBs)
Hands-on experience in message queue (Kafka, RabbitMQ, etc.)
Experience working with Agile/Scrum/Kanban
Experience with mobile network and operator-grade networking
Mastering Software Development Experience (Bash, Python, JavaScript)
Experience AI platforms, including UnicornAI, ChatGPT, VertexAI, Gemini, Claude 3
Master or PhD in Computer science or Engineering degree or related field


Location: Any major Canadian city
